title: Updated Luxury! Granite! Stainless Steel!
posting_body: Community Amenities: Club House, Perimeter, Two Sparkling Pools, Gated Entrance, Bus stop, Fitness Center, Full-Service Tech Center with Printer, Dog Park with Agility Course, Tot Lot, Free WiFi Areas, Picnic area With Grilling Stations, Running/Biking Trail, Limited Access Gates, Fire Pits and Outside Kitchen, Dog Park with Agility Course, Clothes Care Center
